groups.notSureWillAttend: Not sure if you will attend

storage.dataLossWarningText: Data has been saved {count} times in this session. VKontakte allows updating data up to 1000 times per hour, and refuses to save on the 1001st time. Depending on the number of your groups, one save may require several requests. In this case, data will not be fully saved and will be corrupted. If you have auto-save enabled, we recommend disabling it or stopping in time. We recommend creating a backup in the "Add" tab.
storage.saveErrorText:
Some data could not be saved, so its integrity may be corrupted.
Do not exit the app and restore internet access or wait an hour, then click OK to retry saving. If you accept the risk and do not want to complete saving - click "Cancel", then create a backup just in case.

welcome.title: Community Keeper
welcome.subtitle: Groups, folders, sorting, filtering, built-in gallery with viewing history. Continue?

validation.folderNameReserved: This name is reserved by the system.

albumsSearch.loadAlbumsText:
You applied sorting that requires loading all albums.
Do you want to start loading?
If cancelled, sorting will be reset.

groupsSearch.loadCountersText:
You applied sorting by counters. 
It will only work after loading counters from all groups in the current folder. 
Do you want to start loading? 
If cancelled, sorting will be reset.
